name: SCOREBRD
tagline: Empowering Young Athletes to Share the Joy of Sports
body:
Scorebrd develops online software and mobile device apps that empower 
* youth sports _organizations_ to **manage their programs**;
* youth sports _coaches_ to **teach their players** and 
* youth sports _families_ to **share the joy of their experiences**.

Want to learn more? Contact us at info@scorebrd.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
